summary: Reserve Officers' Training Corps (ROTC) programs are DOD's largest source of military officers. As such, ROTC programs can help cultivate diversity in the military. The population of military officers from ROTC programs became more diverse by race, ethnicity, and gender from academic years 2011-2021. title: Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps: Actions Needed to Better Monitor Diversity Progress
